Description:
Contemporary Living At It's Best!
Set in the sought after Lyndarum Estate and within close proximity to Pacific Epping Shopping Centre, Lyndarum Shopping Complex, Child Care Centres, Schools and transport. Comprising of four generous sized bedrooms with built in robes (master bedroom with quality en-suite walk in robe, quality open-plan kitchen with high-end stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and storage space with adjoining meals area, large study/living room, generous family area, ducted heating and refrigerated cooling, security alarm system, ample storage, down lights throughout, quality blinds, low maintenance front and backyard and a double remote control garage with internal and rear access. An opportunity not to be missed!

This beautiful home offers a warmly welcoming personality that's perfect to come home to. Within easy access of Greenbrook Shopping centre, schools, bus services, train and a host of other amenities.

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is

Description:
Family Living In a Perfect Location
Situated in the highly sought-after suburb of Wollert in the Aurora Estate is this beautiful single-story residence with convenient access to local shopping centre, schools, early learning centre, Pacific Plaza Epping, Northern Hospital and easy freeway access.
This Beautiful home offers ideal living for those seeking quality and comfort.
Boasting; 3 generous bedrooms, (including master with walk in robe and en-suite), separate main bathroom with shower and bath tub, an awesome kitchen located in the heart of the home and forming part of an open plan area that's bathed in loads of natural light, with space for family dining and living. All overlooking a large undercover alfresco with ideal for year-round entertaining.
Quality conveniences include; remote controlled double garage with internal access, central heating and evaporative cooling throughout alarm system , plenty of storage, a separate laundry with external access .
Within easy access to the new Edgars road and walking distance to the new Wollert shopping centre comprising Coles & Aldi, Harvest Home primary school and much more. Inspect today!

Description:
Look No Further - Your Search Is Over
If you're needing convenience to schools, shops and public transport your search has ended here. This quaint home is situated in a quiet court and will suit first home buyers and investors alike.
Comprising of 3 bedrooms (master with ensuite and walk-in robe), built-in robes to the other two bedrooms, open plan lounge adjoining lovely kitchen with meals area, central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry. Outside boasts a lovely undercover patio perfect for entertaining guests. Complete with a host of features including roller shutters, ducted heating, cooling, lock up garage plus much more.
With nothing left to do but move in, this is exactly what you have been waiting for.

Description:
IF LOCATION AND LAND SIZE IS IMPORTANT...
This elevated double brick residence on your shopping list, within walking distance to Epping Train Station, Dalton Village Shopping Centre and St Monica's College will satisfy the most astute home buyer.
Offering expansive living zones, timber kitchen with SS appliances, loads of bench space, family meal area, formal lounge/dining and rumpus which overlooks the covered alfresco, master with BIR's and en-suite, 5 further double bedrooms, all serviced by a second bathroom. Also features window shutters, secure electric gates and circular drive way to double lock-up garage.

Description:
Beautifully Presented with Modern Taste
Finally, a beautifully presented, quality built family home in a premium location that has been meticulously kept and maintained, evident in its pristine presentation. Offering lifestyle, comfort and convenience in every aspect of this beautifully rendered home, only minutes away from all local amenities such as Pacific Epping, Aurora Village, public transport, childcare and local schools just walking distance away, The Northern Hospital, parklands and a public outdoor gym at the end of the street.
Set in a quiet friendly pocket of the highly sought after Aurora Estate this comfortable family home offers three generous sized light filled bedrooms, all with robes, master with walk in robe and en-suite bathroom, centrally located main bathroom with quality stone top vanity, separate bath and tiled to the roof. Move into the heart of the home and enjoy an open plan kitchen/living/meals area with quality Linea appliances, dishwasher, 40mm stone top waterfall benches and ample storage. The family will enjoy the very versatile and generous rumpus room opening up onto a timber tiled, under cover alfresco and outdoor lounge area, ideal for entertaining all year round, featuring Zip Track blinds to enclose the entire area, a built-in heater and ceiling fan. Just move in and enjoy without a cent to spend.
Additional features of this fine property include:
Ducted heating throughout
Evaporative cooling
Security alarm
Ceiling fans throughout
Double block out blinds throughout
Double remote garage with double glow driveway
Solar panels on roof
Front door camera
Diamond cut concrete
Freshly painted
Porcelain tiles throughout

Contemporary home with no owners corporation fees!
A fantastic opportunity has arisen to purchase this lovely contemporary home with street frontage and no owners corporation fees close to Epping train station, local shops, schools and within easy access to the Western Ring Road.
Offering two generous sized bedrooms with built in robes, spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, open plan living, holland blinds, split system heating/cooling, car space and a private low maintenance courtyard.
Ideally suited to first home buyers, investors, young families or someone looking to downsize. Inspections are a must, so please be quick!

Description:
Spectacular opportunity In Blue Chip Area!!
Ideally positioned in a highly sought-after pocket of Epping. This impressive home is positioned 23km northeast of Melbourne's CBD. Walking distance to the Epping Views Primary School and the Lyndarum Town Centre. Few minutes driving to the Epping Plaza and Aurora Town Centre. Easily accessible from Oherns Road and Hume freeway. This lovely home will suit ideally for first home buyers, investors and downsizers.
House Offering:
- 3 x bedrooms plus study room (main with full ensuite)
- 2 x bathrooms
- Open kitchen and dinning area
- Large living area which ensures plenty of space for everyone
- Heating and cooling throughout the property
- Single lock up garage plus driveway car space
Combine all this with Epping Football and tennis club together with public transport services at your fingertips. This is your chance to secure a great family home or investment in an emerging high growing suburb.
Make sure this one is on your "must see" list before it is gone! Feel free to contact Bo Qiang on 0433 610 880 for an inspection.

Description:
Quiet Court Location
This home is positioned in a highly sought after pocket in Epping. Boasting 4 bedrooms, comfortable lounge, kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooking family/meals area leading to under cover outdoor entertainment area. Stepping outside is where you will find the swimming pool, complete with low maintenance backyard. Extras include: studio or office/large rumpus room at the rear, ducted heating, evap cooling, alarm, storage sheds, laundry, a long driveway perfect for ample car accommodation and much more. All set on a large allotment of 635m2 plus walk to Greenbrook shopping centre, parklands, schools & in close proximity to Epping & South Morang Train Stations. Be quick to inspect before it's gone!

Description:
Luxury living in a Premium Location
Situated in a quiet street of ever popular Epping on a substantial block of 490sqm (approx) this beautiful family residence has it all. Be greeted by the wide, light filled entrance that is graced with combination of porcelain tiles and timber flooring leads you past formal lounge, spacious master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite leading to timeless and well- appointed gourmet kitchen with walk in pantry, stone bench tops, plenty of cabinetry space & 900mm stainless steel appliances overlooking dining and family area. Other three generously proportioned bedrooms, spacious central bathroom, linen room and large laundry, linen/storage room.
Step outside to large alfresco with café blinds and low maintenance spacious backyard to let your kids run free in safety of their own backyard or to entertain friends or family for years to come. Other features includes 5KW solar system, security camera, security alarm, video intercom, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings throughout. Amazing location just walking distance quality schools, child care, health and leisure facilities, Aurora Shopping Village, well maintained parklands, buses and just short drive to Epping North Shopping, Epping plaza, COSTCO and Epping train station. You will be impressed by the continuity of prestigious traits throughout and love the fact that you can just move in and start to enjoy next to well-maintained parklands. One of the finest homes offered in the suburb and with a short stroll to schools, shops and transport, inspection is a must.

Description:
Nest or Invest in a Great Location!!!
Set in a quiet cul-de-sac, you will find beautifully presented family home offering a tranquil lifestyle within easy reach of some of Epping finest destinations.
An impressive fusion of space and family flexibility are showcased throughout, with a comfortable floorplan comprising an open plan living and dining room, flooded with light and garden outlook.
A well-appointed timber kitchen features generous benchtop and breakfast bar, a plethora of cupboard storage and quality appliances, seamlessly integrating with the spacious family room.
Well zoned for family living, the master retreat and sitting room is privately placed at the front of the home with a huge walk-in dressing room and new renovated ensuite. A further three generous bedrooms are located at the rear, serviced by a centrally located main bathroom.
Relax outdoors in the fabulous decked entertainment area, offering the perfect place for summer get-togethers and weekend BBQs.
Extras include ducted heating, split system cooling and remote-controlled garage.
Superbly positioned only moments from schools, shops and public transport making this property a must see for the growing family and investor alike.

Description:
Brand New Family Home in Lyndarum Estate
If you are looking for a brand new exceptional quality built family home in a premium location, then this one is for you, offering lifestyle, comfort and convenience on all levels of location, accommodation and aesthetic appeal, only minutes away from all local amenities such as Epping Plaza, newly built Aurora shopping village, Epping train station, buses, childcare, local schools, Health & medical facilities & plenty of parklands. It offers three spacious bedrooms including master bedroom with walk in robes and full en-suite, other bedrooms with BIR, central bathroom, large laundry, gourmet kitchen with big island stone benchtops, soft close cabinetry, walk in pantry and top of the range 900 mm SS appliances overlooking open plan family and dining area leading to low maintenance backyard. Other features include gleaming polished hard wood floorboards, luxurious carpets, high end window furnishings, NBN ready, security alarm, video intercom, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum system, remote operated garage etc. Highest quality on offer, be quick to inspect!

Description:
Renovated Family Home On 600M2 Approx
Located in a key pocket of Epping this home is only a couple of minutes' walk to Greenbrook Primary school & Greenbrook shopping complex and if that's not enough you are situated close to the Epping plaza, Westfield shopping centre and both the Epping and South Morang Train stations.
This inviting home is in pristine condition that offers the perfect opportunity for Investors to buy the home and lease back to the owner for market value for up to 2.5 years or first home buyers and families looking to move into the area can make an offer to secure this home today and simply move in.
Offering 3 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, a large kitchen meals area opening out to a lovely alfresco entertaining area, adjoining meals area, large living room with a study nook, a large separate laundry with easy outdoor access, central bathroom and lock up car port with drive-through access to the large backyard with a well-manicured gardens combined with outdoor undercover area perfect for entertaining all year round.
This home also includes polished floorboards, downlights, ducted heating, 3 cooling units, s/s appliances with a dishwasher, freshly painted and more. With there being too mention your inspection is required to truly appreciate this family sized home.
Don't miss out on this great opportunity as this private sale won't last long!

Description:
Perfect Parkside Living
Set Negotiation: Monday 27th August 2018 at 6:00pm (Unless Sold Prior)
A tranquil bush parkland directly opposite, Creeds Farm café and childcare just a few minutes walk away and Lyndarum shopping village, Epping Plaza and the station all within easy reach enhance the lifestyle appeal of this contemporary home on an easy to manage allotment.
Complementing three bedrooms (main with ensuite) is a generous open plan living zone. Wrapping around a stone finished kitchen, carpet and tiles define living and dining spaces, opening to the north facing rear yard.
- Garage with auto door and internal access
- Ducted heating and split system unit
- Kitchen with stainless steel appliances, filtered water
- Storage options throughout
- Stress free stroll to local cafe
- Easy access to Epping Plaza and station
- Minutes to Lyndarum Village

Description:
A PERFECT FAMILY SETTING
A casual air of homely bliss this well maintained family home offers a world of opportunity to first home buyers & investors. Nestled amongst lush front gardens, in a quiet court locale, this inviting home is within walking distance to Meadow Glen Primary, local shopping & bus services. Features 3 generous bedrooms all with built in robes, spacious living room with adjoining dining or study. Well Appointed kitchen/meals, original central bathroom, gas heating & cooling. Step outside to a generous rear yard with 2 separate undercover entertaining areas, double carport, garden shed, & lots more!
